personal-info-desc: (FR) In this section, you can see and update your personal information.
upload-desc: (FR) In this section, you can your upload documents.
view-letters-desc: Consulter les lettres relatives à votre demande au RCSD
view-cdcp-desc: (FR) In this section, you can see any messages that were sent to you.
view-my-application-desc: (FR)In this section, you can see the status of current or past applications for the Canadian Dental Care Program
subscribe-desc: (FR) In this section, you can subscribe to the email alerts for CDCP, Any time you have a new message, you will be alerted.
